Miscellaneous Function Module¶

This module houses general functions and classes used for data manipulation and reading files from Google Cloud Storage Buckets.

The source module with all importable scripts is located here.

src.misc_functions.create_folder_if_not_existing(folder_path)¶

Use os to create a folder if it does not already exist on the machine

Args:

folder_path (str): folder path to conditionally create

src.misc_functions.gcs_subfolder_exists(bucket_name, subfolder_name, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json')¶

Check whether subfolder exists in a Google Cloud Storage Bucket

Args:

bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket subfolder_name (str): name of subfolder to check for local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file

Returns:

boolean

src.misc_functions.get_unique_count_dict(lst)¶

Generate and return dictionary with counts of unique items in a list

Args:

lst (list): list for which to generate unique element counts

src.misc_functions.index_slice_list(lst, indices)¶

Slice a list by a list of indices (positions)

Args:

lst (list): list to subset indices (list): positions to use in subsetting lst

Returns:

list

src.misc_functions.list_gcs_bucket_files(bucket_name, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json')¶

List file names in GCS bucket

Args:

bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file

src.misc_functions.print_timestamp_message(message, timestamp_format='%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')¶

Print formatted timestamp followed by custom message

Args:

message (str): string to concatenate with timestamp timestamp_format (str): format for datetime string. defaults to '%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'

src.misc_functions.read_gcs_csv_to_pandas(bucket_name, file_name, encoding='utf-8', header='infer', nrows=None, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json')¶

Read a csv file from a Google Cloud bucket to a local pandas.DataFrame() object

Args:

bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket file_name (str): file name of csv object in bucket encoding (str): encoding of csv object. defaults to 'utf-8' header (str | int): header argument passed to pandas.read_csv(). defaults to 'infer' local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file

src.misc_functions.read_gcs_numpy_array(bucket_name, file_name, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json')¶

Read a numpy array (.npy file) from a Google Cloud Storage Bucket

Args:

bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket file_name (str): file name of .npy file in bucket local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file

Returns:

numpy array

src.misc_functions.save_np_array_to_gsc(np_array, bucket_name, file_name, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json', print_ts=True)¶

Save numpy array to Google Cloud Storage bucket as .npy file. Writes a temporary file to your local system, uploads to GCS, and removes from local.

Args:

np_array (numpy.array): numpy array to save in GCS bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket file_name (str): file name of csv object in bucket local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file print_ts (boolean): if True, print timestamp message. defaults to True.

src.misc_functions.unnest_list_of_lists(LOL)¶

Unnest a list of lists

Args:

LOL (list): nested list of lists

src.misc_functions.write_csv_to_gcs(dframe, bucket_name, file_name, local_gcs_json_path='C:/gcs_auth/iod_google_cred.json')¶

Write a csv file to a Google Cloud bucket from a local pandas.DataFrame() object

Args:

dframe (pandas.DataFrame): pandas DataFrame object to store in google cloud storage bucket bucket_name (str): name of Google Cloud Storage bucket file_name (str): file name of csv object in bucket local_gcs_json_path (str): path on local system to Google Cloud json authentication file
